title: Fed Quells Market Angst With $40 Billion Monthly Bill Purchases
description: The Federal Reserve said it will begin buying $40 billion of Treasury bills per month starting Friday, in a move to ease short-term funding costs by rebuilding reserves in the financial system.
content: The Federal Reserve said it will begin buying $40 billion of Treasury bills per month starting Friday, in a move to ease short-term funding costs by rebuilding reserves in the financial system.
